title.value: Predicting method of breeding values of variety samples from collection and crossing combinations using the software package Statistica 6.1
Способ прогнозирования селекционной ценности сортообразцов коллекции и комбинаций скрещивания с использованием пакета программ Statistica 6.1

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Gorelik, V.V., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented the method for prediction of breeding value of collection material and hypothetical cross combinations is described. It is based on making square equation of polynominal regression of productivity using data of accessions' field study. Such regression model includes the elements of productivity structure and economically significant traits which are closely correlated with productivity. The average percent of the difference between actual values of the traits of accession (or cross combination) and optimal values according to the model is used as criterion for prediction of breeding value. The analysis of data obtained during 3-year field study of rye collection revealed accessions and hypothetical cross combinations which were perspective for breeding of highly productive varieties. To build a model of formation of productivity were used field study data collection tetraploid winter rye in 1999-2001. The material was presented by samples from Belarus, Russia, the European region (United Kingdom, Germany, Lithuania, the Netherlands, Norway, Romania, Ukraine, Finland, France, Sweden, the former Yugoslavia), as well as North America (Canada, the USA). In total, 44 were studied collection samples.
